forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High around 55F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 5C. NNW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 40F. NNW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
